mapper.select: select depth2 from sw_region where depth1 = #{depth1}
select region_no from sw_region where depth1 = #{depth1} and depth2 = #{depth2}
mapper.insert: insert into sw_member (id, pwd, name, nick, phone, email, region_no) values (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{nick}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{region_no})
mapper.select: select m.member_no, m.id, m.name, m.nick, m.phone, m.email, r.depth1, r.depth2, a.name_auth, m.joindate from sw_member m, sw_region r, sw_member_auth a where m.region_no = r.region_no and m.member_auth_no = a.member_auth_no order by a.name_auth asc, m.joindate asc
